pages.text: The luminary with mission of protecting the elven world, adventuring to defeat the Dark One.$(br)He is always full of hope. He is clear-cut and shows no mercy for ones with dark power.

You are also the target since your body is under the control of dark power. $(br)He attacks with light spell and ranged slash or dash attack using his swords and bodies refined with magical power. Having distance and attacking with magic is recommended.
